# Install

```{r}
install.packages("textshape")
install.packages("pheatmap")
BiocManager::install("UniProt.ws")
install.packages("enrichR")
install.packages("dynamicTreeCut")
```

# Import

```{r}
library(textshape)
library(pheatmap)
library(UniProt.ws)
library(enrichR)
library(scp)
library(scpdata)
library(dynamicTreeCut)
library(Hmisc)
```

# Load data

```{r}
View(as.data.frame(scpdata())) # Available data sets

scp <- specht2019v3() # Load specific data set

# Subset same type of cells
scp_sub <- scp
condition <- scp[["proteins"]]$SampleType == "Macrophage" & scp[["proteins"]]$lcbatch == "LCB7"

scp_sub[["proteins"]] <- scp[["proteins"]][, condition]

dim(scp_sub[["proteins"]])

df <- assay(scp_sub[["proteins"]])

# Explore
hist(df[, 3])
apply(df, 2, hist)
```

# Calculate correlations

```{r}
corr <- rcorr(t(df[, ]), type = "pearson")

cor_df <- corr$r
p_vals <- corr$P < 0.05
p_vals <- replace(p_vals, is.na(p_vals), TRUE)

cor_df <- cor_df[colMeans(p_vals) > 0.05, colMeans(p_vals) > 0.05]

# apply(as.data.frame(apply(abs(cor_df), 2, sd)), breaks = 40, 2, hist)

# Filter some proteins
condition <- apply(abs(cor_df), 2, sd) > 0.05
cor_df <- cor_df[condition, condition]
dim(cor_df)

# Cluster and order the data frame
ordered_cor_df <- cluster_matrix(cor_df, dim = "both", method = "average")

# Plot the heat-map
pheatmap(ordered_cor_df,
         color = colorRampPalette(c("#4d72af", "white", "#c44e53")) (101),
         breaks = seq(from = -1, to = 1, length.out = 101),
         border_color = NA,legend = FALSE, show_colnames = FALSE, 
         show_rownames = FALSE,
         cluster_rows = FALSE, cluster_cols = FALSE,
         cellwidth = 0.15, cellheight = 0.15,
         fontfamily = 'sans', fontsize = 10)
```

# Identify Clusters

```{r}
distance_df <- 1 - cor_df

tree <- hclust(as.dist(distance_df), method = "average")

memberships <- cutreeDynamic(tree, minClusterSize = 30)

memberships <- as.data.frame(memberships)
```

# Enrichment

```{r}
# Choose a cluster
table(memberships)

cluster_members <- rownames(cor_df)[memberships$memberships == 3]

length(cluster_members)

# Map to Gene names
up <- UniProt.ws(taxId = 9606)
res <- select(
    x = up,
    keys = cluster_members,
    to = "Gene_Name"
)

# List of databases: View(listEnrichrDbs())

dbs <- c("WikiPathway_2023_Human", "GO_Biological_Process_2023", "KEGG_2021_Human")
enriched <- enrichr(res$To, dbs)
plotEnrich(enriched[[1]], showTerms = 10,
           numChar = 40, y = "Ratio", orderBy = "P.value")
```
